pr_title: HDDS-4189. Change `ozone admin om getserviceroles` to `ozone admin om roles`

timeline.message: HDDS-4189. Change `ozone admin om getserviceroles` to `ozone admin om status`

timeline.bodyText:
I think we should keep getserviceroles as an alias for compatibility.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                name = "status",
          
          
            
                name = "status", aliases = "getserviceroles",
timeline.author: adoroszlai

replies.bodyText: Thanks @adoroszlai for the idea, I agree with it.
replies.author: cxorm

timeline.message:
fixup! Keep getserviceroles as alias

Co-authored-by: Doroszlai, Attila <6454655+adoroszlai@users.noreply.github.com>
fixup! use `roles` as the command name
